Text: is there any difference between ntsc and pal..even after putting the mod chip??pls answer this question..

@prio23
Not unless you have a pal(or ntsc) only tv.
I had that and even after putting the mod chip the games would work but they would be in black and white on my pal set.
As long as you have a tv that can play both pal and ntsc you are fine.
